text: Motion

One, two, three, four!
One, two, three, four!
We, did it...? We did it!!
Howa, Meguru-chan ......!

I-It hurts, Meguru.
Don't hug me all of the sudden...!

We were perfect now! It was perfect, right!?
It was all lined up properly!? Producer!

Yeah, that was great! The best I've ever seen...
...You girls did a really good job...!
...I'm glad

It's just a few more days until the debut live.
You have to show off the results of your practice...!

Ehehe.
Leave it to us, producer!

Meguru, don't let your guard down, ...But, it
was so good that I wanted to say so... i guess.

Fufu... yeah... 
Thanks to you girls for teaching me so much...

I was the best feeling ever.
It felt like I was flying in the sky...

Yes, Mano... was very majestic, you turns
were beautiful and you were able to look ahead...
──...I'm glad the three of us could do it!

Hiori…！
That's right, I feel the same way…!

With the three of us together,
I'm sure we can go as far as we want.
Yeah... / Yep...!

Haha...
──…Everyone, do you still have time?

......?
Yes, I'm okay with it, but...
Motion

Okay, then...
How about a pre-live launch after this?

Pre-live launch...
You mean, a party...!?

Haha, I guess that's how it's going to be!
Let's celebrate Illumine's big day together...!
Motion
